column2: IDEA-120753: Allow tool window weight to be configurable in the .idea.properties

column3: Before the toolwindow weight was hardcoded to 0.33f. Now it can be configured in the .idea.properties by uncommenting line 108. This new weight is used whenever a new project is created and a toolwindow NOT configured in window-manager.xml is created (ie: 'Maven Projects').
Settings like this, if made configurable at all, should be configured through the registry (see Registry.java and registry.properties), not through idea.properties.
Apologies, I did not know that! I will make the necessary changes today. Is there by chance a dev guide that explains all of this? I did not see one initially.
I accidentally closed the PR by mistake and GitHub won't let me reopen it. I made a new one at #161. Sorry for the inconvenience.
